snippet: Why ride a bicycle 200 miles over crunching gravel? “Because I can,’' one recent convert said about gravel grinding.
lead_paragraph: Why ride a bicycle 200 miles over crunching gravel? “Because I can,’' one recent convert said about gravel grinding.

headline.seo: Wind Can’t Stop Cycling’s Gravel Grinders in the Dirty Kanza
headline.main: Neither Wind Nor Gravel Will Stop These Grinders
